sentences.sentence: He could not confide them even to his wife, although they provide the unacknowledged foundation of his fiction.
sentences.translation: 他甚至不能向他的妻子倾诉，尽管它们为他的小说提供了不为人知的基础。

sentences.sentence: It is important to have someone you can confide in.
sentences.translation: 有一位心腹知己很重要。

sentences.sentence: It is important that an adolescent boy should have an adult in whom he can confide.
sentences.translation: 一个青春期男孩应该有一个他能倾吐心声的成年人，这是很重要的。
